title: -.github_workflows_go-test.yml
text:
## [[Tags]]
[[--- ðŸ§¬ Por Clasificar]]

```bash
name: Go CI

# Se ejecuta en cada push o PR a main (puedes ajustar rama)
on:
  push:
    branches: [ main ]
  pull_request:
    branches: [ main ]

jobs:
  test:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    steps:
      - name: Chequear cÃ³digo
        uses: actions/checkout@v3

      - name: Instalar Go
        uses: actions/setup-go@v4
        with:
          go-version: '1.21'

      - name: Cache de mÃ³dulos
        uses: actions/cache@v3
        with:
          path: ~/.cache/go-build
          key: ${{ runner.os }}-go-${{ hashFiles('**/go.sum') }}
          restore-keys: |
            ${{ runner.os }}-go-

      - name: Descarga dependencias
        run: go mod download

      - name: Ejecutar tests
        run: go test ./... -v

```
